slides.title: Problem
slides.content: Plastic water bottles are a major environmental pollutant, contributing to landfill waste and ocean pollution. Consumers are increasingly aware of this issue and are seeking sustainable alternatives, but current options are often inconvenient or expensive.

slides.title: Solution
slides.content: Canned Water offers a convenient, sustainable, and readily recyclable alternative to plastic water bottles. Our product provides the same refreshing hydration in an infinitely recyclable aluminum can, addressing consumer demand for eco-friendly options without compromising convenience or quality. Canned Water directly tackles plastic pollution and promotes a circular economy.

slides.title: Market
slides.content: The target market includes environmentally conscious consumers, retailers seeking sustainable product offerings, and events/venues aiming to reduce their plastic footprint. The bottled water market is a multi-billion dollar industry, with a growing segment dedicated to sustainable alternatives. slides.content: We will generate revenue through direct sales to consumers (online and through partnerships with retailers), wholesale distribution to businesses and events, and potential licensing agreements. The goal is to raise seed funding to scale production, expand distribution channels, and implement targeted marketing campaigns to drive customer acquisition and market share.
